pages.title: About
pages.author: katherinegonzalescncs
pages.content:
Our Story

I’m Katherine, a busy mom of three adventurous boys! Motherhood is an incredible journey, but let’s be honest—it’s also tough, especially when you feel like you’re navigating it without a village. After years of juggling the endless responsibilities of parenting, managing a household, and working a full-time job, I realized I wasn’t alone in feeling overwhelmed.

That’s why I created Modern Mother's Helper. It started with a simple idea: to be the helping hand that all moms deserve but few actually have. I wanted to create a service that provides moms and families with real support, the kind that lightens the load and brings more joy into daily life.

At Modern Mother's Helper, we understand the mental load of motherhood because we’ve been there. That’s why our services are designed to help you reclaim your time and energy. Whether it’s organizing your home, running errands, taking down holiday decorations, or simply helping you reset your space, we’re here to make life easier and more manageable.

Have Questions?

Ask Us Anything!

Instagram Facebook

pages.title: Privacy Policy
pages.author: katherinegonzalescncs
pages.content:
Who we are

Suggested text: Our website address is: http://box4172/cgi/addon_GT.cgi?s=GT::WP::Install::Cpanel+%28gsulozmy%29+-+127.0.0.1+%5Bnocaller%5D.

Comments

Suggested text: When visitors leave comments on the site we collect the data shown in the comments form, and also the visitor’s IP address and browser user agent string to help spam detection.

An anonymized string created from your email address (also called a hash) may be provided to the Gravatar service to see if you are using it. The Gravatar service privacy policy is available here: https://automattic.com/privacy/. After approval of your comment, your profile picture is visible to the public in the context of your comment.

Media

Suggested text: If you upload images to the website, you should avoid uploading images with embedded location data (EXIF GPS) included. Visitors to the website can download and extract any location data from images on the website.

Cookies

Suggested text: If you leave a comment on our site you may opt-in to saving your name, email address and website in cookies. These are for your convenience so that you do not have to fill in your details again when you leave another comment. These cookies will last for one year.

If you visit our login page, we will set a temporary cookie to determine if your browser accepts cookies. This cookie contains no personal data and is discarded when you close your browser.

When you log in, we will also set up several cookies to save your login information and your screen display choices. Login cookies last for two days, and screen options cookies last for a year. If you select "Remember Me", your login will persist for two weeks. If you log out of your account, the login cookies will be removed.

If you edit or publish an article, an additional cookie will be saved in your browser. This cookie includes no personal data and simply indicates the post ID of the article you just edited. It expires after 1 day.

Embedded content from other websites

Suggested text: Articles on this site may include embedded content (e.g. videos, images, articles, etc.). Embedded content from other websites behaves in the exact same way as if the visitor has visited the other website.

These websites may collect data about you, use cookies, embed additional third-party tracking, and monitor your interaction with that embedded content, including tracking your interaction with the embedded content if you have an account and are logged in to that website.

Who we share your data with

Suggested text: If you request a password reset, your IP address will be included in the reset email.

How long we retain your data

Suggested text: If you leave a comment, the comment and its metadata are retained indefinitely. This is so we can recognize and approve any follow-up comments automatically instead of holding them in a moderation queue.

For users that register on our website (if any), we also store the personal information they provide in their user profile. All users can see, edit, or delete their personal information at any time (except they cannot change their username). Website administrators can also see and edit that information.

What rights you have over your data

Suggested text: If you have an account on this site, or have left comments, you can request to receive an exported file of the personal data we hold about you, including any data you have provided to us. You can also request that we erase any personal data we hold about you. This does not include any data we are obliged to keep for administrative, legal, or security purposes.

Where your data is sent

Suggested text: Visitor comments may be checked through an automated spam detection service.

pages.title: Home
pages.author: katherinegonzalescncs
pages.content:
SERVING MOMS IN THE GREATER AUSTIN AREA & NEW BRAUNFELS

For Moms Who Do It All - We're Here To Help

Get Started Today

Moms are expected to do literally everything, including but definitely not limited to:

  • Keep the house spotless at all times.

  • Know exactly where everyone’s lost shoes, keys, and homework are.

  • Schedule doctor’s appointments and playdates.

  • Remember every birthday, school event, and spirit day theme (because heaven forbid you forget “Dress Like Your Favorite Historical Figure” day).

  • Keep track of which socks belong to which child.

  • Sign every permission slip, field trip form, and last-minute book fair request.

  • Respond to “Mom? MOM?! MOMMMM!” approximately 700 times a day.

  • Decorate for the holidays but also take everything down before it becomes weird.

  • Keep everyone alive, happy, and healthy.

  • Somehow find time for a sliver of self-care.

 

And somehow, through all of this, moms are just expected to make it look easy.

That’s where Modern Mother's Helper comes in. We take some of those endless tasks off your plate, so you can breathe, relax, and actually enjoy a little time for yourself. Because doing it all is overrated.

Moms are expected to do literally everything, including but definitely not limited to:

  • Keep the house spotless at all times.

  • Know exactly where everyone’s lost shoes, keys, and homework are.

  • Schedule doctor’s appointments and playdates.

  • Remember every birthday, school event, and spirit day theme (because heaven forbid you forget “Dress Like Your Favorite Historical Figure” day).

  • Keep track of which socks belong to which child.

  • Sign every permission slip, field trip form, and last-minute book fair request.

  • Respond to “Mom? MOM?! MOMMMM!” approximately 700 times a day.

  • Decorate for the holidays but also take everything down before it becomes weird.

  • Keep everyone alive, happy, and healthy.

  • Somehow find time for a sliver of self-care.

 

 

And somehow, through all of this, moms are just expected to make it look easy.

 That’s where Modern Mother's Helper comes in. We take some of those endless tasks off your plate, so you can breathe, relax, and actually enjoy a little time for yourself. Because doing it all is overrated.

Personalized Solutions Crafted To Support the Unique Needs of Busy Moms

View Packages & Pricing

Our Mission

Our Mission is simple: to help Austin moms keep their cool while juggling it all. Think of us as your modern-day village - ready to support, empower, and make life run smoother, one task at a time. We strive to provide busy families with personalized, reliable support to simplify everyday life. From organizing and running errands to managing household tasks, we are here to be the extra set of hands you can count on. With a focus on professionalism, attention to detail, and a passion for making life easier, we help your home run smoothly so you can focus on what matters most.

Our Mission

Our Mission is simple: to help Austin moms keep their cool while juggling it all. Think of us as your modern-day village - ready to support, empower, and make life run smoother, one task at a time. We strive to provide busy families with personalized, reliable support to simplify everyday life. From organizing and running errands to managing household tasks, we are here to be the extra set of hands you can count on. With a focus on professionalism, attention to detail, and a passion for making life easier, we help your home run smoothly so you can focus on what matters most.

BOOK A FREE CONSULTATION

Frequently Asked Questions

What is a Mother's Helper?

A Mother’s Helper is someone who provides household support to make daily life easier for families. Some call us “personal assistants” or “family assistants” but we like to think of ourselves as a second “you”. Our Helpers focus on tasks like tidying up, organizing, meal prep, errands, and any other services that will help you reclaim your time.

Can I customize the tasks my helper performs?

Yes! You can create a personalized list of tasks for your Helper to complete, and this can be updated as your needs change.

Are your helpers trained?

Yes. All of our Helpers are W-2 employees that are thoroughly vetted, reliable, and experienced in household management. They undergo extensive background checks, reference checks, and training to ensure high-quality service.

Do You Offer Childcare?

Not at this time. Our focus is on helping with all the other tasks that make daily life easier, so you can have more time for what matters most. However, we may explore childcare services in the future.

Are there any fees or requirements for booking?

No! Our services are offered on a weekly basis so that you can use it when you need it. Our goal is to keep our services as accessible and straightforward as possible, so you only pay for the assistance you receive.

How do I schedule service?

You can book services by filling out our online form or giving us a call or email. We’ll match you with a Helper based on your schedule and needs.

What makes your company different?

We are proudly owned and operated by women! We’ve been there—the endless laundry, the cluttered countertops, the never-ending list of things to do. Most of our Helpers are moms too, so we know firsthand what it takes to keep a household running smoothly, and we’ve turned that experience into a service designed to make your life easier. We don’t just get it—we live it.

What Hours are Available For Service?

We have Helpers available to assist you 7 days a week between the hours of 7:00AM and 11:00PM.

TESTIMONIALS

What Our Clients Say

Having Katherine help in our home is such a relief to our busy life with a toddler. Working full time from home, I can't get to the hundreds of tasks that need to be done to keep up the house during the week. Katherine learned our house and what we need, she works efficiently (like a mom!) and she has a special knack for organizing and making our space feel peaceful and like my to-do list is all done! Once she's done, we're always so happy and shocked at how nice the house looks and we can just relax. Heather C. PURCHASE A GIFT CARD

pages.title: Services
pages.author: katherinegonzalescncs
pages.content:
OUR PROCESS

PACKAGES

Standard

2 hours weekly | $79

Lighten your weekly load with 2 hours of dedicated assistance to create a clean, orderly, and visually pleasing space. Personalize your service by selecting whichever tasks that will help provide the most value to your busy life, such as:

  • General tidying - putting things back in their designated places and ensuring that surfaces are neat and clear.
  • Laundry assistance - sorting laundry, washing and drying items using the appropriate settings, folding freshly laundered clothes, and neatly putting them away in their designated spaces.
  • Dishes - washing and rinsing plates, glasses, utensils, and cookware by hand or loading and unloading the dishwasher; drying and putting away clean items.
  • Light cleaning - wiping down counters and high-touch areas, sweeping/vacuuming, making beds, light organization to clear clutter.
Get Started

Comprehensive

3 hours weekly | $119

The Comprehensive plan is a more thorough approach offering 3 hours of assistance to help you stay on top of household chores. Choose from additional services including but not limited to:

  • Standard care - general tidying, laundry assistance, dish care, and light cleaning to keep your home organized, fresh, and clutter-free. 
  • Grocery pickup - pick up groceries, deliver them to your home, and put everything away in designated areas properly and efficiently.
  • Meal prep - planning, prepping, and organizing meals that suit your family’s tastes and dietary needs; chopping veggies and portioning ingredients to preparing ready-to-cook dishes. 
  • Cleaning out fridge/freezer - remove expired items, wipe down shelves and drawers, neatly restock your essentials.
  Get Started

Premium

4 hours weekly | $159

Perfect for households that require consistent, dedicated assistance to maintain a smooth and stress-free routine week after week. 

  • Standard care - general tidying, laundry assistance, dish care, and light cleaning to keep your home organized, fresh, and clutter-free.
  • Kitchen assistance - grocery pickup, meal prepping, fridge/freezer clean out, etc.
  • Running errands - dry cleaning drop off or pickup, return packages, pick up prescriptions, pet-related errands, post office visits, etc.
  • Any other tasks that will help to keep your home neat and your sanity restored.
 **This package can be split into two 2-hour blocks. Get Started

Elite

5 hours weekly | $199

 

Experience unparalleled support with our Elite Package — crafted for busy moms who need more than just help but a partner in managing life’s demands. This all-inclusive package ensures every detail is handled with precision and care.

  • Standard care & kitchen assistance - general tidying, laundry assistance, dish care, light cleaning, grocery pickup, meal prepping, fridge/freezer clean out, etc.
  • Running errands - pick up prescriptions, post office visits, dry cleaning drop off or pickup, return packages, etc.
  • Organizing & cleanouts - perfect for tackling those overwhelming spaces. Whether you're clearing out a garage or pantry, or preparing for a move, we will help you get it accomplished.
  • Put up / take down holiday decorations - we’ll lend a helping hand to ensure everything is done quickly and beautifully.
 **This package can be split into two 2.5-hour blocks. Get Started

Standard

3 hours weekly | $129

Lighten your weekly load with 2 hours of dedicated assistance to create a clean, orderly, and visually pleasing space. Personalize your service by selecting whichever tasks that will help provide the most value to your busy life, such as:

  • General tidying - putting things back in their designated places, decluttering areas by removing unnecessary or misplaced items, and ensuring that surfaces are neat and clear.
  • Laundry assistance - providing support to ensure your clothing, linens, and other washable items are clean, fresh, and properly managed. This service includes tasks such as sorting laundry, washing and drying items using the appropriate settings, folding freshly laundered clothes, and neatly putting them away in their designated spaces
  • Dishes - ensures your kitchen stays clean, organized, and ready for use. This service includes thoroughly washing and rinsing plates, glasses, utensils, and cookware by hand or loading and unloading the dishwasher. It also involves drying and putting away clean items, wiping down countertops, and organizing the sink area. 
  • Any other tasks that will help to keep your home neat and your sanity restored.

Comprehensive

3 hours weekly | $119

The Comprehensive plan is a more thorough approach offering 3 hours of assistance to help you stay on top of household chores. Choose from additional services including but not limited to:

  • Standard care - general tidying, laundry assistance, dish care, and light cleaning to keep your home organized, fresh, and clutter-free. 
  • Grocery pickup - pick up groceries, deliver them to your home, and put everything away in designated areas properly and efficiently.
  • Meal prep - planning, prepping, and organizing meals that suit your family’s tastes and dietary needs; chopping veggies and portioning ingredients to preparing ready-to-cook dishes. 
  • Cleaning out fridge/freezer - remove expired items, wipe down shelves and drawers, neatly restock your essentials. 
  Get Started

Premium

4 hours weekly | $159

Perfect for households that require consistent, dedicated assistance to maintain a smooth and stress-free routine week after week. This can be done in one 4-hour block, or spread out over 2-4 days depending on your unique needs.

  • Standard care - general tidying, laundry assistance, dish care, and light cleaning to keep your home organized, fresh, and clutter-free.
  • Kitchen assistance - grocery pickup, meal prepping, fridge/freezer clean out, etc.
  • Running errands - dry cleaning drop off or pickup, return packages, pick up prescriptions, pet-related errands, post office visits, etc.
  • Any other tasks that will help to keep your home neat and your sanity restored.
 **This package can be split into two 2-hour blocks. Get Started

Elite

5 hours weekly | $199

Experience unparalleled support with our Elite Package — crafted for busy moms who need more than just help but a partner in managing life’s demands. This all-inclusive package ensures every detail is handled with precision and care.

  • Standard care & kitchen assistance - general tidying, laundry assistance, dish care, light cleaning, grocery pickup, meal prepping, fridge/freezer clean out, etc.
  • Running errands - pick up prescriptions, post office visits, dry cleaning drop off or pickup, return packages, etc.
  • Organizing & cleanouts - perfect for tackling those overwhelming spaces. Whether you're clearing out a garage or pantry, or preparing for a move, we will help you get it accomplished.
  • Put up / take down holiday decorations - we’ll lend a helping hand to ensure everything is done quickly and beautifully.

pages.title: Job Seekers
pages.author: katherinegonzalescncs
pages.content:
Interested In Joining Modern Mother's Helper?

Are you organized, caring, and ready to make a real difference in the lives of busy families? Join Modern Mother's Helper in Austin, TX, where we’re redefining support for moms by giving them the help they deserve!

About Us:
We are on a mission to support moms and families by providing the extra help they need to navigate their busy days. From tidying up, to organizing a messy pantry, to tackling that mountain of laundry piling up, or picking up and unloading groceries, we make life easier and more manageable for parents juggling it all.

What You'll Be Doing:

  • Light Housekeeping: Tidy up, organize, and assist with everyday household tasks.
  • Meal Prep: Help with simple, family-friendly meals or snack prep.
  • Organizing: Sorting, decluttering, and creating systems that simplify access and improve usability.
  • Errands: Lend a hand with groceries, pickups, or other small tasks that lighten the load.
  • Anything/Everything: Our goal is to be as helpful as possible, so any tasks that are needed, we say yes!
 

Why You'll Love This Job:

  • Flexible hours that work with your schedule.
  • A fulfilling role where you’ll directly impact the lives of busy moms.
  • Competitive pay.
  • Creative Problem Solving: Every home and family is unique, offering you the chance to use your creativity to find customized solutions that work for each client.
  • Personal Growth: This job offers the chance to develop new skills in organization, time management, and customer service while making a real difference in people’s lives

We’re Looking For Someone Who:

  • Has experience with housekeeping, children, or both.
  • Is reliable, punctual, and communicative.
  • Brings a positive attitude and is a natural problem-solver.
  • This position is great for: nanny's, teachers, stay at home moms, servers/bartenders, college students, and anybody that gets joy from helping people and knowing that the work you're doing directly impacts a mom in need of support.
 

Position Requirements:

  • Must be at least 18 years of age.
  • Must be willing to submit to background check.
  • Emotional Intelligence and a willingness to anticipate needs and ask for guidance when necessary.
  • Must be able to follow instructions and ensure that all tasks are completed the way the client prefers.  
  • Time Management - Must be extremely efficient to ensure as many tasks as possible can be completed.
  • Must have reliable transportation.
  • Must be able to lift 30-40 lbs and stand/walk for extended periods of time.
 

Join Us and Make a Difference!
If you’re looking for a flexible, meaningful role where you can bring your skills to help families thrive, we’d love to hear from you! Apply today and be part of a team that’s changing the game for moms everywhere.

posts.title: What Is A Mother's Helper?
posts.author: katherinegonzalescncs
posts.content:
What Is A Mother's Helper

What Is A Mother's Helper?

Picture this: You’re staring down a mountain of laundry that seems to multiply every time you blink. The dishes are waging a rebellion in the sink, and your grocery list is a chaotic scroll of half-legible scribbles. Enter the Mother’s Helper—not with a cape, but with a to-do list and a get-it-done attitude.

Contrary to what the name might suggest, a Mother’s Helper isn’t just for childcare. In fact, in this context, there’s no babysitting involved. Shocking, I know. So, what exactly do we do? Glad you asked.

A Mother’s Helper is your behind-the-scenes MVP. We’re not here to turn your house into a Pinterest board, but we will take care of the never-ending list of chores so you can focus on the important stuff—like finally drinking a cup of coffee while it’s still hot.

Here’s what we do handle:

  • Laundry: Washing, folding, ironing—whatever it takes to defeat the fabric chaos.
  • Dishes: Because “sink archaeology” shouldn’t be a part of your day.
  • Meal Prep: Chopping, mixing, and planning so you can skip the “what’s for dinner” panic.
  • Errands: From grocery shopping to picking up that thing you ordered online but forgot to grab.
  • Tidying Up: Keeping your space livable so you’re not walking into a stress tornado every day.

Why The Name "Mother's Helper"?

Sure, we could call ourselves “household assistants” or “family assistants” or "personal concierges" but let’s be honest: "Mother’s Helper" has a nice ring to it. It’s nostalgic, straightforward, and says exactly what we’re about—helping moms (or anyone, really) tackle the chaos.

Who Needs A Mother's Helper?

  • Busy Moms: Obviously.
  • Working Professionals: Because your to-do list shouldn't double as a workout.
  • Anyone Who's Overwhelmed: If life feels like a perpetual Monday, we've got you.

Final Thoughts

A Mother’s Helper is like that friend who rolls up their sleeves and gets stuff done—without making you feel bad for the state of your laundry pile. We’re here to make your life easier, not perfect, because life’s messy, and that’s okay.

Ready to offload some of those chores? We’ll bring the elbow grease; and some coffee too.
